expression.value:
SELECT * FROM nilai INNER JOIN matapelajaran ON 
matapelajaran.id_matapelajaran = nilai.id_matapelajaran INNER JOIN siswa ON siswa.nis=nilai.nis 
INNER JOIN kelas ON kelas.id_kelas=nilai.id_kelas
WHERE id_nilai='
